title: Add images for every service item on the Services page

requirements.text: Ensure every service item displayed on the Services page has an associated image by adding image paths for all services in frontend/src/data/services.ts (not only the currently featured 4–5 services).

quotes: I want to Images for all types of services not only 4 or 5

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/data/services.ts, every Service item in every category includes an image field pointing to a file under /assets/generated/ with .dim_800x600.jpg naming.
The Services page (frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx) renders an image for every ServiceCard; there are no service cards without an image on the page.

requirements.text: Add new premium, consistent-style service images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the corresponding services in frontend/src/data/services.ts.

quotes: I want to Images for all types of services not only 4 or 5

acceptanceCriteria: All newly required service images exist at the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
Each new image matches the site’s existing premium dark/charcoal with warm gold accent aesthetic and is correctly displayed in the corresponding ServiceCard.

constraints: Do not introduce any backend dependency, booking system, payments, or login; keep all CTAs routing only to WhatsApp/phone/Instagram as currently implemented.

Do not edit any frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
nonGoals: Do not change service names, descriptions, categories, or prices beyond adding image references.
Do not redesign the Services page layout; only ensure full image coverage for all service items.
